ext_byteorder.c

00001 
00002 float byteorder_swapf32(float f){
00003     unsigned char c,*a;
00004 
00005     a = (unsigned char *)&f;
00006     c=a[3]; a[3]=a[0]; a[0]=c;
00007     c=a[2]; a[2]=a[1]; a[1]=c;
00008 
00009     return f;
00010 }
00011 
00012 double byteorder_swapf64(double f){
00013     unsigned char c,*a;
00014 
00015     a = (unsigned char *)&f;
00016     c=a[7]; a[7]=a[0]; a[0]=c;
00017     c=a[6]; a[6]=a[1]; a[1]=c;
00018     c=a[5]; a[5]=a[2]; a[2]=c;
00019     c=a[4]; a[4]=a[3]; a[3]=c;
00020 
00021     return f;
00022 }
